languages.text: "Ты всего лишь человек, как и те люди, которых ты судишь. Примирись с собой и найди новый способ служить закону".
"You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."
languages.original_text: "Ты всего лишь человек, как и те люди, которых ты судишь. Примирись с собой и найди новый способ служить закону".

traits.locale_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."
"You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."
"You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."
"You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."
"You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

languages.text: 「裁く相手と同じく、君もただの人間だ。自分自身と和解し、法に仕える新たな道を見つければいい」
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: 「裁く相手と同じく、君もただの人間だ。自分自身と和解し、法に仕える新たな道を見つければいい」

languages.text: "Ihr seid nur ein Mensch, genau wie die Personen, über die Ihr richtet. Schließt Frieden mit Euch selbst und findet eine neuen Weg, dem Gesetz zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid nur ein Mensch, genau wie die Personen, über die Ihr richtet. Schließt Frieden mit Euch selbst und findet eine neuen Weg, dem Gesetz zu dienen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes humain, tout comme les personnes que vous jugez. Acceptez cette vérité et trouvez une autre manière de servir la loi. »
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes humain, tout comme les personnes que vous jugez. Acceptez cette vérité et trouvez une autre manière de servir la loi. »

languages.text: «Es simplemente humano, como el resto de las personas a las que juzga. Haga las paces consigo mismo y busque un nuevo modo de servir a la ley».
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: «Es simplemente humano, como el resto de las personas a las que juzga. Haga las paces consigo mismo y busque un nuevo modo de servir a la ley».

languages.text: “你也只是个普通人，和被你审判的那些人没有任何区别。想办法与你自己和解，寻找新的方式来为法律服务吧。”
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: “你也只是个普通人，和被你审判的那些人没有任何区别。想办法与你自己和解，寻找新的方式来为法律服务吧。”

languages.text: "Sen sadece bir insansın, tıpkı seni yargılayanların da olduğu gibi. Kendinle barış ve yasalara hizmet etmenin yeni bir yolunu bul."
languages.original_text: "You are only human, just like the people you judge. Make peace with yourself and find a new way to serve the law."

traits.locale_text: "Sen sadece bir insansın, tıpkı seni yargılayanların da olduğu gibi. Kendinle barış ve kanuna hizmet etmenin yeni bir yolunu bul."
